item.title: Assigning variables
item.description: This is how you assign a value from right to left. 1 my $x = 1; this is how you assign a value from left to right. Perl 1 do_something(12, sub ($x) { ... }); JavaScript 1 do_something(1, function(x) { ... }) F# 1 doSomething 1 (fun x -> ... )
